intro: This Return, Refund & Cancellation Policy governs the terms under which products purchased on the FirgoMart platform may be returned, cancelled, or refunded.

sections.title: Scope
points: Applicable to all customers purchasing on FirgoMart
Valid for website and mobile application orders
Applies to FirgoMart and third-party sellers
Seller-specific terms may apply where disclosed

sections.title: Return Eligibility
points: Damaged, defective, or incorrect products
Product does not match description
Return request within 7 days of delivery
Unused, unwashed, and original condition
Original packaging, tags, and accessories intact

sections.title: Non-Returnable Items
points: Personal care, beauty, cosmetics, hygiene products
Innerwear and intimate apparel
Customized or made-to-order products
Items marked as Non-Returnable

sections.title: Return Process
points: Login to FirgoMart account
Go to My Orders
Select order and click Request Return
Choose reason and submit
Pickup or self-ship instructions provided after approval

sections.title: Refund Policy
points: Refund to original payment method
COD refunds via bank transfer or wallet
Initiated within 3–7 working days after inspection
Bank credit time depends on provider

sections.title: Cancellation Policy
points: Orders cancellable before dispatch
Shipped orders cannot be cancelled
FirgoMart may cancel due to stock, pricing, fraud, or delivery issues
Full refund issued for seller-initiated cancellations

sections.title: Exchange Policy
points: Direct exchanges are not available
Eligible products can be returned and reordered

sections.title: Shipping Charges
points: Shipping charges are non-refundable
Refunded only for damaged, defective, or incorrect items
Reverse pickup charges may apply

sections.title: Seller-Specific Policies
points: Return timelines may vary by seller
Seller terms shown on product page
FirgoMart facilitates resolution as per policy

legal.amendment: Policy may be updated anytime without prior notice
